vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.6.14;
son of: Seraiah (H8304H);
brother of: Ezra (H5830);
father of: Joshua (H3091J); also called Jozadak at Ezr.3.2,8; 5.2; 1x
§ Jehozadak or Josedech = "Jehovah is righteous"
grandson of the high priest Hilkiah; son of the high priest Seraiah; and father of the high priest Joshua; he never attained the office of high priest himself because he was carried captive to Babylon by Nebuchadnezzar
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Seraías; sumo sacerdote; tribu de Leví; en tiempos del exilio
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約撒答 或 約薩答 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "約和華是公義的"
大祭司西萊雅的兒子,和大祭司約書亞的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约撒答 或 约萨答 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "约和华是公义的"
大祭司西莱雅的儿子,和大祭司约书亚的父亲
